channel.title: Yellow-orange belt on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in Yellow-orange belt on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Yellow-orange belt / 8th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki (Front kick and front punch) Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki (Front kick and opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 4: Step up sidekick (surikomi sokuto) Blocking Blocking Pairs Inner block/Backfist/Gyakuzuki Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Sidekick to the side/Front kick/Opposite punch (Yoko sokuto/Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 2: Roundhouse kick/Opposite punch (Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Side kick/Back fist (Sokuto/Uraken)
